sentences.sContent: My choreographer keeps chiseling away at me, hoping to shape me into perfection.
sentences.sContent_eng: My choreographer keeps chiseling away at me, hoping to shape me into perfection.
sentences.sCn: 我的舞蹈编导总是不断雕琢我，一心将我塑造成完美的舞蹈家。

sentences.sContent: "A choreographer told me that what professionals are looking for in a good dancer is core body strength, " said Dr Neave.
sentences.sContent_eng: "A choreographer told me that what professionals are looking for in a good dancer is core body strength, " said Dr Neave.
sentences.sCn: “一个舞蹈编导告诉我专家们寻找优秀舞蹈演员的核心指标就是身体力量，”内尔博士透露。

remMethod.val: choreo(舞蹈) + graph(写) + er(人) → 书写舞蹈的人 → 舞蹈指导

trans.tranOther: A choreographer is someone who invents the movements for a ballet or other dance and tells the dancers how to perform them
